alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Lancaster; Otoe; Pawnee; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 11:28PM CDT until May 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LANCASTER...JOHNSON...NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON... SOUTHWESTERN OTOE...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE...PAWNEE AND GAGE COUNTIES... At 1127 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles south of Panama to 3 miles west of Tecumseh to 3 miles west of Table Rock, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Beatrice, Tecumseh, Pawnee City, Wilber, Firth, Adams, De Witt, Cortland, Sterling, Plymouth, Table Rock, Clatonia, Hallam, Pickrell, Filley, Elk Creek, Burchard, Liberty, Lewiston and Virginia. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Lancaster; Otoe; Pawnee; Saline
